# IP Mapping for clients
client1:192.168.10.11/24:192.168.10.1:switch1
client2:192.168.10.12/24:192.168.10.1:switch1
client3:192.168.10.13/24:192.168.10.1:switch1
client4:192.168.10.14/24:192.168.10.1:switch1
client5:192.168.10.15/24:192.168.10.1:switch1
client6:192.168.20.10/24:192.168.20.1:switch2
client7:192.168.20.11/24:192.168.20.1:switch2
client8:192.168.20.12/24:192.168.20.1:switch2
client9:192.168.20.13/24:192.168.20.1:switch2
client10:192.168.20.14/24:192.168.20.1:switch2
